summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the improvement of Carkeek Drive south, west side only, from South Cambridge Street to approximately 330 feet south thereof; and from South Fairbanks Street to approximately 210 feet southerly thereof; from Haraden Place South to 39th Avenue South; and from 42nd Avenue South to approximately 305 feet south thereof; and certain other streets, avenues and easements, by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 6374, and appropriating money from the Sewer Fund in aid thereof as a loan, and for the acquisition of the necessary right of way for said local improvement district.
